name: Sudoku Crossword Free Puzzle game
description:
Sudoku and Crossword puzzles meet in this fresh, new game for iPhone and iPad. As in other number crossword puzzle games, you will be given a list of numbers (1- to 5-digits each) and challenged to insert them all into a cell grid. Unlike other number crosswords, though, each row, column and box of cells must contain exactly one of each digit (1-9 in the standard game).

But the fun doesn't end there! You may also purchase and play larger puzzles with more numbers, with up to 18 numbers (1-9 and A-J) total - a puzzle 4x the size of a traditional 9x9 sudoku game! Or purchase a smaller size to practice. The possibilities are virtually endless!
